home_capture_desc: Take a photo with a high-quality camera and AI will analyze it instantly.
home_history_desc: Record and compare skin changes over time.
home_consult_desc: Get expert consultation from the research institute.
tech_intro: combines cutting-edge AI technology with dermatology to provide accurate and scientific skin diagnosis solutions.
tech_dl_desc: Using Computer Vision technology and Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN), we analyze skin images at the pixel level and detect even subtle changes. AI trained on thousands of clinical data provides dermatologist-level accuracy.
tech_metrics_desc: We analyze key indicators of skin health from multiple angles to evaluate overall skin condition.
tech_tracking_desc: Record skin changes with each capture and analyze trends over time to provide personalized care solutions.
tech_tracking_desc_long: Automatically record skin changes with each capture and visualize time trends with graphs. Analyze weekly/monthly/annual change patterns to identify seasonal and lifestyle-based skin reactions and predict future skin conditions through prediction algorithms.
tech_personalized_desc: AI-based personalized product recommendation algorithm provides smart recommendations considering country, climate, age, and season.
tech_personalized_desc_long: By combining skin analysis results with personal information (country/climate/age/season), the AI recommendation engine presents optimal product combinations. Calculate Double UP synergy effects to provide accurate recommendations with 70~98% matching rate.

faq_subtitle: Find answers to your questions about CURETEMBIO AI Skin Diagnosis
faq_a1: CURETEMBIO AI Skin Diagnosis is a system that uses artificial intelligence to analyze your skin condition across 10 indicators (tone uniformity, brightness, pigmentation, wrinkle depth, elasticity, moisture content, sensitivity, redness, acne occurrence, and pore condition) from a single selfie. You can receive instant analysis results and personalized product recommendations in just 10 seconds.
faq_a2: The analysis is based on AI facial recognition technology and deep learning algorithms, with continuous improvement through accumulated user data. However, AI analysis is for reference purposes, and we recommend consulting a dermatologist for precise diagnosis.
faq_a3: We currently support 10 languages: Korean, English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Thai, Vietnamese, Indonesian, Malay, and Spanish. The site automatically detects your browser language and displays content accordingly.
faq_a4: CURETEMBIO AI Skin Diagnosis service is 100% free. Anyone can use it without registration, payment, or subscription. We recommend following our official SNS.
faq_q5: How many times can I get diagnosed?
faq_a5: You can get diagnosed as many times as you want without limit. We recommend regular photography to track and manage skin changes. Up to 10 records can be stored on your device, and unlimited storage is available with membership registration.
faq_q6: Where can I purchase recommended products?
faq_a6: EXOBIO products are available at official online stores and pharmacies and dermatology clinics nationwide. You can find official store links on the Info page.
faq_q7: Can I use multiple products together?
faq_a7: Yes, you can. The Double UP system combines Premium and RED lines to address multiple skin concerns simultaneously. Alternating products 3-4 times a week is effective.
faq_q8: Can I use it with my existing products?
faq_a8: Yes, EXOBIO ampoule is used as the first step after cleansing, so you can continue using your existing toner, lotion, and cream.
faq_q9: How long until I see results?
faq_a9: Results vary by individual, but with intensive use 3-4 times a week, you can typically experience noticeable improvement within 8-12 weeks. For complex care, we recommend consistent use for 12-16 weeks.
faq_a10: EXOBIO products are alcohol-free, fragrance-free, and colorant-free (3-Free) and suitable for sensitive skin. However, individual skin conditions vary, so we recommend patch testing with a small amount before first use.
faq_a11: EXOBIO 357 Ampoule is an exosome-based skincare product that started in dermatology clinics and is recognized by pharmacies. It's designed to address various skin concerns including elasticity, brightening, soothing, and moisturizing, and enhances effectiveness when used as the first step in skincare.
faq_q12: What's the difference between EXOSOME and RED lines?
faq_a12: The Premium line is a high-concentration product for skin requiring intensive care, while the RED line is for daily care and preventive management. They can be used individually or combined (Double UP) depending on skin condition.
faq_a13: No.3 specializes in brightening, No.5 in elasticity (elastin), and No.7 in soothing/moisturizing (barrier) functions. The most suitable number is recommended based on AI analysis results.
faq_a14: Through individual use and combinations of EXOBIO Premium (3 types) and RED (3 types) lines, a total of 29 customized care combinations are possible. AI automatically recommends the optimal combination by analyzing your skin condition.
faq_q15: Are my photos stored on the server?
faq_a15: No. All captured images and analysis data are encrypted and stored only on your device (browser) and are not transmitted to the server. We prioritize personal information protection.
faq_a16: Yes, you can delete all photography records and analysis data anytime by pressing the 'Delete All' button on the History page. You can also completely delete through 'Delete All My Data' on the Info page.
faq_a17: CURETEMBIO prioritizes personal information protection. Captured images and analysis data are stored only on your device and are not transmitted to the server. Only when requesting expert consultation are your name, email, and consultation content encrypted and transmitted.
faq_q18: Can I use it on mobile?
faq_a18: Yes, CURETEMBIO is optimized for mobile. You can access and use it on smartphones, tablets, and PCs, and get diagnosed immediately after allowing camera permission.
faq_q19: How do I get customer support?
faq_a19: Contact us via official email (curetembio@gmail.com) and we'll respond within 1-2 business days. Operating hours are weekdays 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM. You can also request expert consultation on the Info page.
faq_q20: Can pharmacies or dermatology clinics use it?
faq_a20: Yes, pharmacies and dermatology clinics nationwide are introducing CURETEMBIO AI Skin Diagnosis service. Customers can immediately receive skin analysis services by scanning a QR code. For partnership inquiries, please contact our official email.
